Attributes.description: Introduction to polymeric coatings and finishes used in the wood products industry; surface preparation, application equipment and properties of various coatings; wood deterioration and its protection for external applications.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: All of WOOD 282, WOOD 305, WOOD 373.
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 2, Days: Wed, Start Time: 9:00, End Time: 12:00, Building: Forest, Room: Sciences
